title: Verifiable Profile schema
description: This schema is used to define an open and re-usable profile information model that can be managed in a git repository.

version.description: JSON schema version. MUST match the schema version - directory name.

profilePhotoPath.description: Relative path to the profile photo stored in the repository.

bio.description: Brief description, your interests, your professional background

projects.description: Absolute references to one or more git repositories

profiles.description: With this property you can reference other git profiles you own at other online repositories. The profile will be processed only if it is cross-referenced, meaning, that the referenced repository must reference this profile.
